trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in list or tabular form.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve tabular or list-style data from an ASP.NET data source control and bind user-interface (UI) elements of the control to that data for display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別是用於擷取表格式 ASP.NET 控制項的基底類別或清單樣式資料 ASP.NET 資料從原始檔控制，並顯示該資料繫結控制項的使用者介面 (UI) 項目。

trans-unit.source: Composite data-bound controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>; list-style data-bound controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>; and other controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: 複合資料繫結控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>; 清單樣式資料繫結控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>; 和其他控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>。

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: 不使用網頁開發人員<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別直接; 相反地，他們會使用衍生自這個類別的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Control developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface and classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> classes.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員將延伸這個類別來建立資料繫結控制項，可搭配類別可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面和類別，衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>類別。

trans-unit.source: When deriving a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method to bind the UI elements of your control to data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的類別時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別，覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法來擷取資料繫結控制項的 UI 項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is the only method you will override in your derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是您將會覆寫衍生類別中的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method is the equivalent of the `DataBind` method, and is called to bind data at run time.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 2.0 的資料繫結控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法相當於`DataBind`方法，並將資料繫結在執行階段呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class to create a custom data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別來建立自訂的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `TextBoxSet` control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control for each data item retrieved from its associated data source control, and binds to the value of the data item at run time.
trans-unit.target: `TextBoxSet`控制項建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制每個資料項目擷取自其相關聯的資料來源控制項，並在執行階段繫結至資料項目的值。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of the `Render` method renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls as an unordered list.
trans-unit.target: 目前的實作`Render`方法呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制項做為未排序的清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `TextBoxSet` control, defined in the previous example, and bind it to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`TextBoxSet`控制項，在上一個範例中，定義，並將它繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl" /> class for use by an inherited class instance.
This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
Occurs when data methods are being called.
The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的目的是要讓您有機會指定所要呼叫資料方法位於不同的物件，而非<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object used by the data-bound control if no arguments are specified.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> initialized to <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A> property to initialize a default arguments object, and by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A>初始化預設引數物件的屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method can be used in a derived class to retrieve a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法可以在衍生類別中用來擷取預設<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> object is being created.

The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance in scenarios where you want to use a custom class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的目的是要讓您有機會變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>在案例中您要使用衍生自的自訂類別的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to, in cases where the data source contains more than one distinct list of data items.
The name of the specific list of data that the data-bound control binds to, if more than one list is supplied by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 特定的資料繫結控制項繫結，如果一個以上的清單由資料來源控制項所提供的資料清單的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.
The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
trans-unit.target: 代表資料來源的控制項別碼，資料繫結控制項會由此擷取其資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface, which provides access to the object's data content.
An object with access to its data content.
trans-unit.target: 具有其資料內容的存取權的物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.

If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> property is set, a specific, named <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> is returned; otherwise, the default <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> is returned.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object from the associated data source control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>物件相關聯的資料來源控制項，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property is used to identify a data source, a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性用來識別資料來源，預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>建立物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method is called to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object from the associated data source control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%2A> method is called to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法呼叫以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>從相關聯的資料來源控制項的物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%2A>呼叫方法來擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: Both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> properties are set.
\- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> property is set but a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object by that name does not exist.
Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface that the data-bound control is associated with, if any.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> that represents the data source identified by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" />.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> method internally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>方法在內部。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> instance is retrieved by these two methods and is cached by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object until the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method signals that the data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>執行個體這兩種方法來擷取和快取的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>直到物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法發出信號，指出資料來源有變更。

trans-unit.source: The control identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property does not exist in the current container.
\- or -
The control identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface.
Gets a value that indicates whether model binding is in use.
<see langword="true" /> if model binding is in use; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果模型繫結之用;否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data item type for strongly typed data binding.
The name of the model type.
trans-unit.target: 模型類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property enables the `Item` and `BindItem` data-binding expressions.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性可讓`Item`和`BindItem`資料繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: Setting this method automatically enables Dynamic Data functionality.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個方法會自動啟用動態資料功能。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view state to restore.
Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SaveViewState" /> method.
Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.
The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項維護指出它目前繫結至資料的檢視狀態中的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A> method sets the value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法將值設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A> method is used by a derived data-bound control class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法由衍生的資料繫結控制項類別。

trans-unit.source: After data is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method and bound to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A> method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires it during the current page's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 所擷取的資料之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法，並繫結至控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性設定為`false`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法為呼叫來表示控制項已完成繫結，而不再在目前網頁的生命週期中需要它。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> object that is being created.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreatingModelDataSource" /> event.
Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.
The source of the event, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged" /> event.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法已變更基礎資料來源和控制項應重新繫結，以及應該執行任何所需的工作會告知資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>資料來源檢視的屬性已經變更時呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` when it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`時，便會產生<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains event data.
Handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to set the initialized state of the data-bound control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the HTTP request is not a postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以設定資料繫結控制項並設定初始化的狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`如果 HTTP 要求不回傳。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> that raised the event.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> method is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`在其中的 HTTP 要求是回傳，已啟用檢視狀態，但是資料繫結控制項具有尚未已繫結的情況下。

trans-unit.source: This scenario is common with controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>, where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此案例中是常見的控制項例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>，其中控制項的可見性則會在執行階段變更。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> list of data returned from a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect" /> method call.
When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

Implement this method instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method when you derive a data-bound control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法，而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法衍生的資料繫結控制項時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: Placing your control's data-binding logic in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> enables you to avoid the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> events being raised in the wrong order.
trans-unit.target: 放置在控制項的資料繫結邏輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>可讓您避免<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>引發事件的順序錯誤。

trans-unit.source: While the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class provides no specific implementation for this method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to bind the values of any user interface (UI) controls to the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 雖然基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別會提供任何特定的實作，此方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法，以將任何使用者介面 (UI) 的值繫結控制項所擷取的資料加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method in a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>從衍生類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>。

trans-unit.source: The `TextBoxSet` control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control for each data item it is bound to.
trans-unit.target: `TextBoxSet`控制項建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>繫結至每個資料項目的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the associated data source.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is called after data is retrieved to bind data to elements of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法將資料繫結至資料繫結控制項的項目擷取資料之後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的類型覆寫此方法的預設實作不是適當時才擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: Typically, it is sufficient to provide a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback> delegate that performs any custom data work, rather than implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，便可提供<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback>委派，會執行任何自訂資料的工作，而不需實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to retrieve data from an associated data source using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method and bind it to the elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法來擷取資料相關聯的資料來源使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法並將它繫結至控制項的項目。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
The control's current view state.
If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that the data-bound control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> value used by the data-bound control to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" />資料繫結控制項用於擷取資料的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A> property calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method to create a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A>屬性呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法來建立預設<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Causes view-state changes to the control to be tracked so they can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
An object set to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> property.
Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A> method is only called in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class's mutator (`set` accessor) for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A>方法只會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>類別的 mutator (`set`存取子) 的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class checks the type of the object that is set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property to ensure that it is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>類別會檢查已設定的物件型別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性，以確保它是的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。

trans-unit.source: The object passed by the <paramref name="dataSource" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> or a recognized type.
